rows.label: qst500702_msg0201
rows.name:
So...you slaughtered that Ardun
we were raising, huh?

rows.label: qst500702_msg0202
rows.name:
Well, I'm sure you had your reasons...
Maybe you wanted to steal his horns
or his hooves for something.

rows.label: qst500702_msg0203
rows.name: No, I'm not blaming you really...

rows.label: qst500702_msg0204
rows.name:
This is a farm, we'll have plenty more
Ardun calves to raise...

rows.label: qst500702_msg0205
rows.name:
But maybe I won't ask you to help
take care of them in future.

rows.label: qst500702_msg0001
rows.name:
Wow... So you defeated
Relentless Arduran, huh?

rows.label: qst500702_msg0002
rows.name:
It's okay, I don't blame you for it.
This is a farm, we have to say goodbye
to all our animals sooner or later.

rows.label: qst500702_msg0003
rows.name:
Thanks to you guys, he got big and
strong. And I'd say he had a chance to
express himself at the end of his life.

rows.label: qst500702_msg0004
rows.name:
I think he'll have been satisfied to
go out fighting such a worthy foe.
I know I'm proud of you both.

rows.label: qst500702_msg0005
rows.name:
He'll live on in our hearts and our
memories, so we don't need to feel sad.

rows.label: qst500702_msg0006
rows.name:
In a way he's always close by.
I'm sure he'd love it if you came by
to visit sometime!

rows.label: qst500702_msg0101
rows.name:
Hey there! Our old pal's still
doing just fine.

rows.label: qst500702_msg0102
rows.name:
Maybe you should go spend
some time with him. He seems
pretty eager to play.
